items.sentence: Tom forgot he'd promised to call Mary last night.
I want you to go shopping with me this afternoon.
Get back before midnight or you'll be locked out.
A torpedo sunk the ship Tom's grandfather was on.
A couple in Boston adopted Tom when he was three.
Tom's mother made the shirt he was wearing today.
You really should be getting ready for the party.
Tom was afraid that somebody would recognize him.
If I were you, I wouldn't do something like that.
It would probably be hard to do that by yourself.
It wasn't Tom who washed the dishes. It was Mary.
It's a shame that you weren't allowed to do that.
What's the best time of the year to visit Boston?
What's the stupidest thing that you've ever done?
What's the best advice anyone has ever given you?
I need to finish doing this before I can go home.
The weather today is a bit better than yesterday.
There's a good restaurant not very far from here.
It's not possible to get away from your problems.
According to the newspapers, it'll snow tomorrow.
